12. Sexy Dance
13. Miwaku no Jikkenshitsu
14. Juyou to Kyoukyuu: Outsourcing of Love
15. Koi-iro Fitness
16. Idol
17. Anemone
18. Tonari no Touko-san
19. Saaya-san wa Kotowarenai

alternative_titles.ja: ビリーヴ・マシーン 外伝

title: Hahaoya Shikkaku: Elite Oyako no M Buta Netorare Tenraku Jinsei

synonyms: Hahaoya Shikkaku: Elite Oyako no M Buta Netorare Tenraku Jinsei Epilogue Oyako-hen
alternative_titles.ja: 母親失格・エリート親子のM豚寝取られ転落人生

title: Kirishima, Bukatsu Yameru tte yo

synonyms: Kirishima is Going to Quit Club
Kimishima Said He's Going to Quit Club
alternative_titles.ja: 桐島、部活やめるってよ

synopsis:
Kirishima, is a popular teenage boy and a star athlete at his school. For some unknown reason, he seems to have vanished off the face of the earth after quitting the volleyball team. His disappearance eventually became pivotal to the collection of stories about various individuals who are connected to him in some way, with each having a unique point of view about connections, relationships, social boundaries, and the similar events that revolve around them.

(Source: MU)

Each chapter is about different character and drawn by different artist:
1. Kikuchi Hiroki [Yamamori Mika]
2. Koizumi Fuusuke [Toumori Miyoshi]
3. Sawajima Aya [Anemori Kana]
4. Maeda Ryouya [Sato Zakuri]
5. Miyabe Mika [Saitou Julia]
6. Kikuchi Hiroki [Yamamori Mika]

title: Mainichi Shine Shine Itte Kuru Gimai ga, Ore ga Neteiru Suki ni Saiminjutsu de Horesaseyou toshite Kuru n desu kedo......!

synonyms: My stepsister who says Go die go die to me every day, tries to hypnotize me to fall for her while I was sleeping...!
alternative_titles.ja: 毎日死ね死ね言ってくる義妹が、俺が寝ている隙に催眠術で惚れさせようとしてくるんですけど……！

synopsis:
My step-sister who is the same age as me treats me like garbage. This beauty, admired by everyone around her, shows her true ugly nature only in front of me. But upon learning that she loves me so much that she'd even use hypnosis to make me fall for her, what exactly am I supposed to do!? Shizuku asks for one embarrassing demand after the other while moving a 5-yen coin like a pendulum. As her brother, and as a man, which path should I take!?

(Source: Goddess Scans)

title: Ore to Kawazu-san no Isekai Hourouki

synonyms: Chronicles of my adventures in another world with Kawazu-san
alternative_titles.ja: 俺と蛙さんの異世界放浪記

synopsis: Tarou was an ordinary university student until a strange old magician summoned him to another world, upon learning that his magical power is 8 million, he uses that abnormally powerful magic to revive the old man that caused all this... In the form of a frog. Thus begin the strange adventures of a boy with ridiculous magical power and Kawazu, the former strongest magician, now revived as a frog.

title: Magazine Heroines on the Beach

alternative_titles.ja: マガジンヒロインズオンザビーチ [M.H.B!]

synopsis: Special collaboration between Seo Kouji (Fuuka), Hiroyuki (Aho Girl), Yoshikawa Miki (Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo) and Katsuki Hikaru (Baby Steps).

title: βl@ck★OUT
synopsis:
Day laborer Kazuya Shibuya is feeling frustrated with his boring, day-to-day life when a mysterious game called "Blackout" is delivered to him out of the blue. Not knowing what is going on, he starts to play the game, only to find out that what is inside surpasses anything he could have ever imagined. No one has ever managed to beat this game shrouded in mystery. Is "death" awaiting him at the end...?

(Source: MangaBox)

title: Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke wo: Bangai Soushuuhen

synonyms: A Kiss For The Petals: Our Christmas Together
Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke wo: Futari no Christmas
A Chirstmas for the Two of Us
alternative_titles.ja: その花びらにくちづけを 番外総集編

synopsis:
Compilation of 3 doujinshi novels released at Comic Market.

1. Futari no Christmas
2. Futari no Vacance
3. Futari no Atsui Natsu
4. Backstage☆Kiss

title: 13 Game
synopsis:
On his seventeenth birthday, Amamiya Kota was going to ask his classmate Misora Hiyori out. Tragically, he dies in a car accident but is given a second chance back in the living world on borrowed time. He gets entered into a competition called the 13 Game where other people like Kota who were supposed to die return back to the world and given an option: locate and kill 13 other players or suffer the fate of death. Each player is assigned to a handler, mysterious beings with special powers, who use them as if they were characters in a video game. Kota's handler, Merume, explains that there are players like him all over the country, each with a unique ability that helps them kill, and Kota has to kill 13 players within 1 year. With his demon hands ability that was inspired from his hobby of magic tricks, Kota must unwillingly participate in this cruel game if he wants to live.

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Idenshi Level Tsurugi

synonyms: Chiruru, the Girl with Supernatural Powers
alternative_titles.ja: おおひなたごう短篇集・遺伝子レベル剣

synopsis:
8. Chounouryoku Shoujo Chiruru
23. Tenshi no Wakemae (Angel's Share)

alternative_titles.ja: スケット・ダンス Extra Dance

title: Soredemo Suki desu Kasahara-san

alternative_titles.ja: それでも好きです笠原さん

synopsis:
Akiyama is a salaryman who is stressed, overworked, and tired of everyone at his office expecting him to do their jobs on top of his own just because he's an Alpha. After hours he goes to his usual bar, where his Omega drinking buddy Kasahara listens good-naturedly to his drunken rants. Their relationship changes drastically, however, when Akiyama awakens to find himself half-naked and tied up in the other man's bed, with Kasahara begging him to bite his neck!

(Source: Anime-Planet)

title: Before Daylight Love

alternative_titles.ja: ビフォアデイライト・ラブ

synopsis:
Daiki was bought by the Sasaki Group's Wakagashira Tatsumi, who then left Daiki in charge of his bar, Moderate, in order to discharge the remainder of a large debt from his parents. Daiki wants to protect the one place Tatsumi can find peace and is determined to be Tatsumi's shield if need be, but... A love story about two people who need each other more than anyone else even though neither man realizes their feelings for the other. 

(Source: Dangerous Pleasure)

title: Gunjou Reflection
synopsis:
Koharu is a first year at Funakoshi Highschool for the Performing Arts. She is daunted by the fact that her class is filled with nothing but well-known stars. But one day she wants to "take on a role that only she can fill". With this determination in hand, she begins her heart-pounding school life.

She was then given the lead role for a mini play put on as a welcoming party for new students. This play had a special jinx to it: Anyone with a lead role in the play would become a huge star in the future! But she has to perform together with an unknown person, Serizawa Ren...!?

(Source: MU)

title: BanG Dream! Yonkoma: Bandori!

alternative_titles.ja: BanG Dream! よんこま ばんどりっ!

synopsis: BanG Dream! Yonkoma: Bandori! is a 4-koma manga featuring the characters from BanG Dream!

title: Choukadou Girl ⅙

synonyms: Chou Kadou Girl 1/6, Super Mobile Girl 1/6

synopsis:
Bouida Haruto, a hardcore otaku with no interest in 3D (real) women, once appreciated figures from afar, accepting that "if you get into them, there's no turning back." However, when Nona, a character he loved from an anime called "Girls→Planetary Investigation" had a figure of her released, he ended up purchasing it. And then that night, the figure of Nona somehow came to life, and a couple-like lifestyle between man and toy began.

(Source: MU)

title: Utsukushii Karada
synopsis:
"Just thinking I'm about to ink his body... fills me with intense euphoria."
Rookie tattoo artist Yuuji gets an unusual job—to tattoo a painting of master artist Taisen Hanada onto the body of a beautiful young man called Michiru. For 15 years, Michiru has been modeling for Taisen's works, living only for him. Michiru's beautiful face and body are the source of Taisen's inspiration and object of devotion, and Michiru in turn idolizes Taisen. Tasked with tattooing that lovely body, Yuuji senses his inner beast stirring at the sight of Michiru's smooth, fair limbs. "If only I could engrave myself on him, inside and out..." A tattoo artist inscribes a masterpiece of love and desire on an innocent young beauty whose body and soul belong to another...

(Source: Renta!)

title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Hyouketsu no Kizuna

synonyms: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- The Frozen Bond
alternative_titles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, The Frozen Bond
alternative_titles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 氷結の絆

synopsis:
Deep within the isolated Great Elior Forest, a freezing land covered in snow and ice, lives a girl feared for her resemblance to the legendary Witch of Jealousy. She is the half-elf Emilia, her only company a cat-like spirit named Puck. Both are similarly spurred by duty and guilt, yet the two never grow closer. In this world, the days seem as if they're an unchanging eternity, but the trials awaiting them are merciless like hellfire...

(Source: Yen Press)

title: Pokémon Ranger: the Comic

alternative_titles.ja: W ミッションストーリ ポケモンレンジャー the Comic

synopsis:
In yet another area of the Pokemon world, there are no trainers, only rangers who temporarily borrow the service of wild Pokemon for good.

The main character finds himself on an almost impossible mission, and discovers with the Pokemon he has borrowed from the Pokemon he has gathered, hopefully a way to stop the evildoers who have started havoc.

title: The Sound of Your Heart
synopsis:
While it may seem like a mere depiction of everyday life, The Sound of Your Heart is a comedy filled to the brim with wit, sarcasm, and parody. It gives no regard for the probable or realistic—it is a series of absurd situations that is sure to get a laugh out of every reader willing to suspend their sense of reality.

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Great Mazinger
synopsis:
Continuation of the successful manga and anime series Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger starts after the defeat of Mazinger Z. Tetsuya Tsurugi is the new protagonist, piloting the powerful Great Mazinger, a creation of the once thought dead Kenzo Kabuto, the father of Koji Kabuto. This time the enemy is the Mycene Empire and its powerful robots.

(Source: MU)

title: Cambrian
synopsis: Dr. Yamagishi was expelled from an academic society because he had tried to make a human clone. Next theme of his study was a new human species Cambrian. He made himself a test target. However, he turned into a chunk of grotesque flesh, and it began to rape women by its tentacles.

title: Kimi no Tame nara Shineru

synonyms: I would die for the Princess
alternative_titles.ja: 姫〈きみ〉のためなら死ねる

synopsis:
This is a charming work that was very loosely based on the life of Heian era author and poet, Sei Shonagon. The 27-year-old Shonagon, depicted here as a sort of medieval NEET, manages to land a job as the private tutor of a beautiful and refined 13-year-old, Princess Teishi. There are also a number of other quirky court ladies, some of whom have their eyes on Shonagon...

(Source: MU)

title: The Moon
synopsis: Nine children are bestowed the almighty power of the monstrous robot, The Moon. By focusing their thoughts together they become able to control it with their minds and save the world from annihilation.

title: Asa made, Motto.
synopsis: "Let's be lovers when we are grown up",―It was a promise between Mitsuru, a boy next door, and me. One day, Mitsuru transfers to my high school! He has a twin brother, Ryo. But then Ryo kisses me unexpectedly...?!

title: Kitai Fuku ga Aru

synonyms: I show my true colors shining through.

synopsis:
Mami is a college student with a secret that she can't tell anyone: she's really into Lolita fashion. Since she's tall and looks cool at a glance, her family and friends expect that image from her, and she's scared to stray away from that image. However, after seeing Ozawa, a coworker at her part-time job who  doesn't care about what other people think of his eccentric fashion, she gradually opens up her true self to the world.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Rewrite: Oka☆Ken Blog
synopsis: Oka Ken☆Blog is a fourth official Rewrite manga written by Hizuki Yayoi. The manga centers around Oka-ken club and its members.

title: Fate/Grand Order: Okita Souji Makuai no Monogatari - Koko ni

alternative_titles.ja: Fate/Grand Order「沖田総司 幕間の物語 ここに」

title: Botsuraku Yotei nanode, Kaji Shokunin wo Mezasu

synonyms: Expecting to Fall into Ruin, I Aim to Become a Blacksmith
alternative_titles.ja: 没落予定なので、鍛治職人を目指す

synopsis:
The main character is reborn as a character from a game he played in his previous life. He falls into ruin along with the villainess, spending the last of their years together. A man named Kururi Helan.

No details of this decline is written inside the game, it can’t be understood why this sub-character ended up with the villainess route. However, that is of no importance.

Living as a needy farmer along with someone is unpleasant, so the main character seeks a profession. For now, he aims for becoming a blacksmith as he originally had skill in it.

(Source: Novel Updates)

title: Kagaku-bu no Megane
synopsis:
Two members of the chemistry club promised each other that they would go from friends to lovers at the summer's end of their sophomore year. Akui is not quite sure what a "boyfriend" is, while Sako seems cheerful, even though he insists it's just an experiment. The four-eyes of the chemistry club are clumsy but sincere in their first experience of experimenting with love.

(Source: Akaneshinsha, translated)

title: Yokohama-sen Doppelgänger

alternative_titles.ja: 横浜線ドッペルゲンガー

synopsis:
Kenzaki Makoto, a debuting sculptor, was arrested as the serial killer of the Yokohama Line series of murders. He insisted that he was innocent but was sentenced to the death penalty. He was executed 11 years after the crime. But when he reopened his eyes, by a twist of fate, he had returned to 11 years ago, 25 days before the crime was committed. Burning with the desire for revenge against the real murderer, Kenzaki begins to take action. The only one he can trust is HIMSELF. The crime suspense story of two selves fighting against fate unfolds.

(Source: MU)

title: Strange Orange
synopsis:
"I want to get a boyfriend in high school." Born on the same day, at the same hospital, Asuka and Tomaru were always together. Though they seem more like twins than real twins, Asuka's desire for independence means separation... a complicated situation?!

(Source: Osuwari Team)

title: Mijuku na Kareshi

synonyms: More Than a Kid, Less Than an Adult

synopsis:
One-shots featuring younger semes and juniors dominating seniors.

1. Aimai na Kankei
2. Yasashiku Toraete
3. Itsuwari no Daishou
4. Man On!
5. Kodomo Ijou Otona Miman
6. Sweet Restraint
7. Miracles Don't Happen
8. Mijuku na Kareshi

title: Mujina into the Deep
synopsis: A young assassin girl armed with a katana is hunting down her targets in a busy metropolitan city named Tsukumo.

title: Shin Kidou Senki Gundam Wing

alternative_titles.ja: 新機動戦記ガンダムＷ〈ウイング〉

synopsis:
It is the year After Colony 195, and war between the Space Colonies and Earth has begun. To give the colonies an edge, they send 5 young soldiers, trained to perfection, to earth in the most powerful of Mobile Suits-Gundams. With their arrival, the tide of the war changes as they battle against the Earth forces and the Colonies of their origin.

(Source: ANN)

title: Pretty Rhythm: Aurora Dream

alternative_titles.ja: プリティーリズム オーロラドリーム

synopsis: Aira, Rizumu and Mion wants to participate to the Prism Show, a famous competition combining ice-skating, singing and dancing, and become its best ice-skater, the Prism Queen.

title: BLT48
synopsis: A boys love anthology consisting of one-shots by various mangaka.

title: Ikidaore mo Dekinai Konna Isekai ja

synonyms: Another World Where I Can't Even Collapse and Die
alternative_titles.ja: 行き倒れもできないこんな異世界じゃ

synopsis:
Sumire was a high school girl before she leapt into another world the moment she fell down. Before she could collapse and die, she came across a silver-haired boy who had already collapsed and was dying. One thing led to another and she ended up working at an Adventurer's Guild. She doesn't have any special powers, but she's well liked by strange plants and animals. What does Sumire's future hold?!

(Source: MU)

title: Kimi wa Shinenai Haikaburi no Majo

synonyms: You Are the Ashen Witch Who Will Not Die
alternative_titles.en: You Are the Cindery Witch That Will Not Die.
alternative_titles.ja: 君は死ねない灰かぶりの魔女

synopsis:
I'm a magic apprentice. "My master," who has been living under this same run-down roof with me, is a shut-in girl who proclaimed herself to be a great witch. Despite sounding all high-and-mighty, my defenseless master loves to watch her disciple cooking for her. Our daily lives, filled with happiness, go by quietly. However, little did I know that behind that quiet, happy daily life is a terrible secret that involves the fate of the world... 

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Chikan Saresou ni Natteiru S-kyuu Bishoujo wo Tasuketara Tonari no Seki no Osananajimi datta

alternative_titles.en: The Girl I Saved on the Train Turned Out to Be My Childhood Friend
alternative_titles.ja: 痴漢されそうになっているＳ級美少女を助けたら隣の席の幼馴染だった

synopsis:
While on his way to school one morning high school second year Ryo Takamori saves his childhood friend Hina Fushimi from a sexual harasser on a crowded train. Although the two are practically opposites in appearance and popularity, not to mention the fact they haven't spoken since middle school, Hina finds herself smitten with the oblivious Ryo. A frustratingly sweet, zero stress romantic comedy! 

(Source: Yen Press)

title: Incandescent Moon
synopsis:
Duan Cheng Feng's aunt is one of the emperor's concubines. In order to keep her high ranking status, she gives the emperor a child, but to her dismay, it's a girl! She tries to convince her family to exchange the female baby for their nephew. In order to avoid it, the young boy's parents fake a serious illness to make her give up her plan. But ambition doesn't stop over such a minor detail... 

(Source: Shoujo Manga Maniac)

title: A Wolf's Attraction
synopsis:
"[From the Movie] Country girl Han-kyung's life undergoes a drastic turmoil after she moves to Korea's pulsating capital Seoul to share more time with her beloved mother. It doesn't take long before trouble comes her way in the form of a flying shoe thrown by the most adored dandy of Han-kyung's district? Ban Hea-won." 

(Source: Red Madness)

title: Dancing Baby Karin

alternative_titles.ja: ダンシングベイビーかりん

synopsis:
Karin has been turned down several times after doing all her best for the guys she liked to like her back. How can a single poem and destroyed skirt bridge her to the great Christmas present waiting her? Keep on the beat as she Break Dance on the music!

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Pop'n Eight Beat
Volume 2: Bokura no Kokoro; Hug!

Tales of a high school calligraphy club.

Yukari Ooe, a boy who returns to Japan from Canada, finds himself joining his new high school's calligraphy club; without enough students, the tiny club is in danger of being abolished.

For Mayuko, wrapping herself into her futon and watching videos of the idol group, KBF, is the best medicine. One day, she is seen dancing KBF's dance at the schoolyard by her tough-looking classmate Ooba-kun...!?

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

synonyms: A Man and a Woman's Love Doll

synopsis:
The strongest miner in the world, Alan, can reduce mountains to rubble with a swing of his trusty shovel—a legendary tool that grants him immortal life and can blast through the strongest of foes. When this legendary miner teams up with a runaway princess to track down cursed jewels and save her kingdom from an invading demon force, evil doesn't stand a chance. A hilarious fantasy tale for fans of RPGs, with adventure...in spades!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

title: The Country Is Saved!
synopsis: A 28-year-old female prosecutor Min-seo is just about to go out with Jun-hyun, a good looking prosecutor whom she has had a crush on since high school. With a successful career and her soon-to-be boyfriend, it seems like she is the happiest woman in the world. However, she suddenly time travels to her high school life while she is chasing a male suspect named Sang-woo; he was a senior in her high school. She genuinely does not want to relive her high school life because it was just the stereotype of a nerd. With a strict moral code as a prosecutor, a teenager's appearance, and two attractive men, namely Jun-hyun and Sang-woo, around her, her second high school life will be nothing like her previous one.

title: Miyamoto Musashi
synopsis: Musashi Miyamoto was a Japanese swordsman and samurai famed for his duels and distinctive style.

title: Taimanin Asagi 3: Saikyou no Taimanin - Igawa Asagi-hen

alternative_titles.ja: 対魔忍アサギ3 最強の対魔忍~井河アサギ編~

title: Succubus na Iinchou ni Okotowari Saremashite

synonyms: Succubus Student Council President Refused Me
I Was Rejected By The Succubus President
alternative_titles.ja: サキュバスな委員長にお断りされまして

synopsis:
Riku Kugahara witnessed a succubus predating on his way out of school as usual, and was fascinated by her intense appearance! However, the succubus was actually Mei Kirihara, the class chairman!

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

title: Tsukiyoda Sadame no Sekai no Sukuikata

alternative_titles.en: How to Save the World by Sadame Tsukiyoda
alternative_titles.ja: 月夜田定の世界の救い方

synopsis:
Tsukiyoda Sadame is a high-schooler and hypocrite who plans to use his charisma to take over the world. Through his machinations, he is able to become instantly popular as soon as he transfers into his new school, to the point where he's nominated as the class rep! However, there is another manipulator at work in his class, also trying to claim power: a girl named Kokoro.

While following her after school (totally not stalking her, though, nothing creepy), Sadame runs into a weird old man. It seems he's been getting "missions" on his smartphone, and if he doesn't complete them, the world will be destroyed. Soon Sadame is recognized as a "messiah" as well, and he gets his first mission-- to steal Kokoro's panties. Could these missions really be from God, and how can he possibly complete them and save the world without utterly ruining his carefully designed public persona!?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Return of the War God

synonyms: Chronicles of the Martial God's Return

synopsis:
Martial Divine Demon, Woohyun Dan, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle. After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys... Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Woohyun.
"A dumpling!" came a reply.

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicles of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

(Source: Papryus, translated)

title: Guild no Cheat na Uketsukejou

alternative_titles.en: Ilya the Hax0r, stays at the Guild Reception
alternative_titles.ja: ギルドのチートな受付嬢

synopsis:
One day, due to God's mistake, Tomoaki Akino's life was accidentally snatched away. Though he gratefully accepted the cheat offered as an apology and reincarnated, he was reborn as a female elf! Then time passed, and Tomoaki now works as the intelligent and beautiful receptionist named Ilya in the Lunéville branch of the Guild Association. In a world of swords and magic, her job in the guild begins today.

(Source: MU)

title: Vanilla Resort
synopsis:
Shy and socially awkward Mutsu is a successful adult mangaka but pretty hopeless at taking care of himself so when he runs into his old basketball team senpai while Akiharu was on a job search it all seems perfect. Lately Mutsu's been juggling so many projects that he can barely hold a spoon from all the drawing much less make time to sleep so when Akiharu helps him out of an awkward situation, it works just a little too well...

(Source: MU)

title: Tabako-chan
synopsis:
Asano is a hardworking employee, but has a deep-seated smoking habit. Whether it is under the pretext of being busy with work, or just having some time to spare, he can be found with a cigarette in hand. Materializing to accompany him each time he smokes is Tabako-chan, the anthropomorphized smoke from his cigarette. Asano's penchant for smoking as well as his dynamic relationship with Tabako-chan leads the two into various encounters and experiences with other smokers, each with their own personified cigarettes.

Through their personified relationships with sexy smoke girls, Tabako-chan explores the unique and vexing struggles of smoking addicts.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Uruwashiki Shuuen
synopsis: Two high school boys struggle to survive in the middle of a zombie apocalypse.

title: Hoshiyomi no Yogensha
synopsis:
Tia is a fortune-teller who lost her power. Judged no longer useful and expendable, she was sent to a neighboring country to assassinate their own powerful, beloved fortune-teller. Tia recklessly attacks and is quickly caught by a castle guard, Riisu. Instead of executing her, Tia is assigned to assist Riisu. The girl who had resigned herself to death warms to her new surroundings and starts to enjoy working and feeling needed again.

(Source: shinkeikaku)

title: Shurayuki-hime: Fukkatsu no Shou

alternative_titles.ja: 修羅雪姫 復活之章

synopsis:
Japan in the time of the Meiji dynasty is a country in transition, torn and dominated by exploitation and moral decline.
Lady Snowblood want's to leave her bloody past behind her and is working under the name Kashima Yuki in a girl's grammar school where she teaches Swedish gymnastics... but conservative political forces are like a thorn in their side, and Yuki must again take up arms to keep the promise she gave to her life-saver.
(Source: Carlsen Manga)

Originally serialised in 1973, but not collected into book form until 2006.

title: Wangan Midnight: C1 Runner

alternative_titles.ja: 湾岸ミッドナイト C1ランナー

synopsis: This new story features the adventures of the new main character, Shinji Ogishima (who debuted in the last chapters of the original story), and his friend, Nobu Setoguchi, both are part of "GT Cars" project which is in dispute and conflict, and must settle these problems by driving Mazda RX-7s around Shuto Expressway, and meeting with Tatsuya Shima.

title: Torikae Appli
synopsis:
Yae is bored with normal sex. She wants to experience something new, so she half-jokingly asks her genius brother Watase if he could create a body swap device. To her surprise it turns out that Watase already has such a device. Yae immediately decides to try it out...

Included one-shots: Play Hooky, Test-go no Totteoki, Mephistopheles: Lydia Aburachenko-hen

title: Isekai de Miryou Cheat wo Tsukatte Dorei Harem wo Tsukuttemita

alternative_titles.ja: 異世界で魅了チートを使って奴隷ハーレムをつくってみた

synopsis:
An ordinary working adult, Miura Ryouta, was summoned to a different world, and was given a charm cheat which he can make every woman fall for him. He used it to travel the world and gather a variety of women to his harem.

(Source: 	Machine Sliced Bread)

title: Chiisai Nozomi to Ookina Yume

alternative_titles.ja: 小さいノゾミと大きなユメ

synopsis:
High schooler Nozomi Koiwa wakes up and discovers she's lost her memories...and a whole lot of height. Now the size of a soda can, she flees from a feline assault into the disgusting den of Yume Okubo, a drunken shut-in NEET who's terrified of people and hasn't been outside for months. Between falling beer cans and deadly insect traps, Nozomi survives long enough to convince the airheaded Yume that she's a figment of her imagination who's come to save her from hitting rock bottom...all while investigating how she ended up funsized. But despite their differences—height, brains, and otherwise—each half of this quirky combo might just be what the other needs!

(Source: Kodansha USA)

title: Ore tte, Tenshi

synonyms: Do You Think I'm An Angel?

synopsis:
1. Ore tte, Tenshi (Do You Think I'm An Angel?)
2. Usagi na Kareshi (My Boyfriend, the Rabbit)

title: Kemeko Deluxe!
synopsis:
Ten years ago, high-school student Sanpeita dreamed he was engaged to a beautiful girl. One morning, an unknown homely girl suddenly pressed him for marriage. The homely girl was named Kemeko.

In order to escape, Sanpeita left for school where Kemeko followed and showed up with an uproar. A larger disturbance was when Sanpeita was targeted by a rice cooker on the school's rooftop.

As Sanpeita and his childhood friend Izumi were being attacked by the rice cooker, Kemeko saved them both. What is the girl's true shape!?

(Source: Dynasty Scans)

title: Shin Gumiho
synopsis:
Shin Gumiho (Shin meaning "new" and Gumiho meaning "old fox") begins with its origins based on Korean folklore. The 9-tailed demon fox, Gumiho, wishes to change into a human in order to keep her promise to the one she loved. However, right before she turns into a human, a vengeful demon-purger arrives and seals her into a sword. Now, in present day Korea, a young boy has found the sword and its contents. Gumiho is reawakened, but what will she do now? Be sure to find out in this wacky adventure.

(Source: MU)

title: Gyakuten Saiban 4 Official Anthology Manga

alternative_titles.ja: 逆転裁判4公式アンソロジーコミック

synopsis: The newest chapter of the Ace Attorney has begun! Join Apollo Justice (A greenhorn defense attorney), Trucy Wright (Apollo's magician-to-be sidekick), Klavier Gavin (a rock an roll take on the prosecution) and many more characters in this fan made manga, published by Capcom on August 1, 2007.

title: Scarlet Cross
synopsis:
Destiny or a beautiful mistake? Tension will spread through the school...

In the midst of this tension, an exciting vampire dance will begin...

alternative_titles.en: With a Dog AND a Cat, Every Day is Fun
alternative_titles.ja: 犬と猫どっちも飼ってると毎日たのしい

synopsis:
With both a cat and a dog, there's double the antics, double the fun (and double the kibble!) but while Inu and Neko coexist peacefully, they have their own distinct personalities, which play out in unexpected, charming ways during these short-form stories.

Whether you're a dog-person or a cat-person, there's plenty to love about these homegrown sketches of daily life shared with four-legged friends!

(Source: Vertical Comics)

synopsis: Juuna's uncle gets her to enroll in the school where he's principal. The only problem is that it's an all boys school! With all those rabid guys around, Juuna needs someone to protect her. In comes Shibuki to be her bodyguard...but Juuna wants him to do more to her body than just guard it!

synopsis:
Ever since he was young, Miharu has suffered from phantom pains. When his divorced parents decide to reunite after 15 years of separation, he discovers the exact reason why: his younger brother, Natsu. Apparently, he and his brother are astrological twins. Miharu feels Natsu's pain, but... Natsu doesn't feel Miharu's? That's just not fair!

(Source: MU)
